ygData.subject: RE: Graphics/Bandwidth (this is long and relatively tec hnical, you've been warned)
ygData.msgSnippet: FWIW, I can usually EITHER get upstairs and get more ice or another soda or beer and be back by the time I pop out of the zone OR make a quick trip to the
ygData.messageBody:
FWIW, I can usually EITHER get upstairs and get more ice or another soda or
beer and be back by the time I pop out of the zone OR make a quick trip to
the little robo-bard's room BUT NOT BOTH! If I HAVE to do both then - there
I am blocking the zone with angry halflings stuck in zone limbo behind me
:-)

Sylly.

p.s. if I gotta go upstairs and it's real late - my a bed will sometimes get
a LOS (line of sight) on me - I'll be charmed in an instant and can never
resist the sleepy spell! All too often, I wake up and wonder not only where
- but if I camped!

-----Original Message-----
From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 04, 1999 3:29 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Graphics/Bandwidth (this is
long and relatively technical, you've been warned)

From: John Kim <kim@...>

Also:

On Wed, 4 Aug 1999, G.W. Willman, IV wrote:
>
> Just because I was interested, I did a little network
watching: zoning

FWIW, on my cable modem and 450 Celeron (OC) with 128MB RAM,
it takes from 15-35 seconds to zone.
